# tibok

> A native macOS markdown editor built with SwiftUI for Apple Silicon. Features live preview, Git integration, 35+ slash commands, tabs, and offline KaTeX rendering.

## Documentation

- [User Guide](user_docs/README.md): Main documentation index with quick start and interface overview
- [FAQ](user_docs/FAQ.md): Frequently asked questions and troubleshooting

## Features

- [Keyboard Shortcuts](user_docs/features/keyboard-shortcuts.md): Complete keyboard shortcut reference
- [Slash Commands](user_docs/features/slash-commands.md): 30+ slash commands for quick formatting
- [Git Integration](user_docs/features/git-integration.md): Stage, commit, push/pull workflows
- [Preview](user_docs/features/preview.md): Markdown preview with syntax highlighting and KaTeX
- [Workspace](user_docs/features/workspace.md): File and folder management
- [Image Handling](user_docs/features/image-handling.md): Drag & drop, paste, and assets folder
- [Find & Replace](user_docs/features/find-replace.md): Search and replace functionality

## Development

- [CLAUDE.md](CLAUDE.md): Development guidelines, architecture, and build instructions
- [Changelog](CHANGELOG.md): Version history and release notes
- [Roadmap](planning/roadmap.md): Development roadmap and future plans

## Optional

- [Progress Notes](progress/): Daily development session notes
- [User Stories](planning/user-stories/): Feature planning documents
